pickaxe.description: A stereotypical pickaxe made of steel. Useful for mining bitcoin but worse, but unfortunately because no one holds it correctly, it often breaks.

[object Object].description: dummy item to prevent killing moofy :(

wooden potato.description: An inedible potato made of wood. This potato was discovered on a farm in Idaho and is rumoured to have mysterious electrical properties. The farmers originally used the potato as an insulator in electrical circuits, but now it is used as a modern device for getting a child (or adult) sick through unsupervised consumption.

moofy coffee.description: Coffee is an incredible food item commonly used to be less tired. Moofy coffee is unique in that it is strawberry-flavoured and is magnetic. Consuming the coffee can reduce the time it takes for you to get less tired by 5-13 minutes.

gun that shoots money.description: This is a simple gun that propells matter to a speed that would negatively impact a human physically should it impact the human at specific locations. Also, this gun is very light, so you can carry many at once. However, it cannot be reloaded, so you should always bring a healthy amount of 10 guns a day to your bank robberies.

specialized pickaxe.description: This specialized pickaxe is modelled after the great Hammer, meaning that you can more easily get bitcoin but worse (BCBW). However, no one uses this correctly, so it breaks often. This pickaxe is rumoured to be able to mine DemoCoin as well.

DemoCoin geode.description: This geode is very special; it looks like a polished jewel from the outside, but in reality it is just a fake plastic covering. However, it can be opened to access the true treasure contained within. The plastic must be opened by chomping it with your teeth.
